first_interaction.speaker: Kim
first_interaction.text: Hi! Ngayon lang kita nakita dito. May kailangan ka ba o nag-eexplore ka lang?

first_interaction.speaker: Kim
first_interaction.text: Kung may gusto kang itanong, sabihin mo lang â€” baka makatulong ako.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Kim
repeated_interaction.text: Oh, ikaw pala ulit! Kumusta, maayos naman ba ang lakad mo?

repeated_interaction.speaker: Kim
repeated_interaction.text: Sabihin mo lang kung may kailangan ka pa, nandito lang ako.
